page.topic: Adding a File to a Web Project

section.description: Web publishing applications only. In common practice, the files that you add to projects will be images and previously created HTML pages.

step.description: Select the project in the Web Projects list to which you wish to add the file.
Optionally, select a file type from the Files of type drop-down list. The options are:
Navigate to the file you want to add, select it, and click Open.
